content.raw:
> I am able to access the model in `/tmp/`, though I can't open any of the download `png`files in that folder.

could you try calling the api directly from a browser using this example and see if you’re able to get the image?

```
https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=40.714%2c%20-73.998&zoom=12&size=400x400&key=YOUR_API_KEY 
```

As for the boost rename error, doing a try catch sound good. In the mean time to workaround the problem, you may have to just manually copy the model in `/tmp` to your `~/.gazebo/models` folder and insert it from the `Insert` tab.
content.html:
I am able to access the model in /tmp/, though I can't open any of the download pngfiles in that folder.

could you try calling the api directly from a browser using this example and see if you’re able to get the image?

https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=40.714%2c%20-73.998&zoom=12&size=400x400&key=YOUR_API_KEY

As for the boost rename error, doing a try catch sound good. In the mean time to workaround the problem, you may have to just manually copy the model in /tmp to your ~/.gazebo/models folder and insert it from the Insert tab.
